General.Name: OMV Petrom S.A
General.Description: OMV Petrom S.A., an energy company, engages in the exploration and production of oil and gas in Southeastern Europe. It operates through three segments: Exploration and Production; Refining and Marketing; and Gas and Power. The Exploration and Production segment produces crude oil and natural gas in Romania; and engages in exploration and production of onshore and offshore oil and gas. Its Refining and Marketing segment operates Petrobrazi refinery, which produces and delivers gasoline, diesel, and other petroleum products; and provides refining storage logistics, transportation, and marketing refined and non-fuel products. The Gas and Power segment engages in sale of gas, and operates gas fired power plant. In addition, it operates filling stations under Petrom and OMV brands, and offers fleet cards including OMV and Petrom cards; En-gross fuels and additives, and specialty products including aviation and marine fuel. The company also provides AdBlue, an air cleaner; bitumen; and heating oil, liquid thermal fuel, and liquified petroleum gas products. It serves aviation, agriculture, cars, construction, plastics, chemicals, electricity, heating, hospitality, and steel industries. The company was founded in 1857 and is headquartered in Bucharest, Romania. OMV Petrom S.A. is a subsidiary of OMV Aktiengesellschaft.
